content: Dragonflight (2022) returned players to Azeroth with the discovery of the Dragon Isles.
It introduced the new playable race Dracthyr and class Evoker, combining mobility and magic.
The story centers on the awakening of the Dragon Aspects and the primal elements.
Professions were completely overhauled with specialization trees and work orders.
Dragonriding introduced dynamic flight mechanics and zone exploration.
Raids like Vault of the Incarnates and Aberrus explored the ancient history of the dragons.
A datamined mount named 'Ashwing Prototype 00X' hinted at a future infinite dragonflight event. (EASTER_EGG)
